languages.text: While the Overseer is in the 1-cell vicinity around its Pet, both of them re-roll failed Dodge rolls.

traits.locale_text: While the Overseer is in the 1-cell vicinity around its Pet, both of them re-roll failed Dodge rolls.

languages.text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.
languages.original_text: Пока надзиратель и его фамильяр находятся на соседних клетках, при неудачном уклонении они могут пробовать уклониться еще раз (не более одной дополнительной попытки на атаку).

traits.locale_text: While the Overseer and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed dodge attempts once per attack.

Пока надзиратель и его фамильяр находятся на соседних клетках, при неудачном уклонении они могут пробовать уклониться еще раз (не более одной дополнительной попытки на атаку).

languages.text: Stehen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} und sein Vertrauter nebeneinander, wiederholen sie misslungene {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichversuche{/g} einmal pro Angriff.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.

traits.locale_text: Stehen der Aufseher und sein Vertrauter nebeneinander, wiederholen sie misslungene Ausweichversuche einmal pro Angriff.

languages.text: Tant que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} se trouve sur une case adjacente à son familier, ils relancent tous les deux les tentatives d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ratées, une fois par attaque.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le surveillant se trouve sur une case adjacente à son familier, ils relancent tous les deux les tentatives d'esquive ratées, une fois par attaque.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}与其使仆相邻时，若监察官或其使仆受到攻击且{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}掷骰失败时，可以再掷一次。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.

traits.locale_text: 当监察官与其使仆相邻时，若监察官或其使仆受到攻击且闪避掷骰失败时，可以再掷一次。

languages.text: Mientras el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} y su familiar estén adyacentes, ambos vuelven a tirar los intentos de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} fallidos una vez por ataque.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el supervisor y su familiar estén adyacentes, ambos vuelven a tirar los intentos de esquiva fallidos una vez por ataque.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}とそのファミリアーが隣接している間、互いに1回の攻撃につき1回、失敗した{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を再判定できる。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} and their familiar are adjacent to each other, both of them re-roll failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attempts once per attack.

traits.locale_text: 監督官とそのファミリアーが隣接している間、互いに1回の攻撃につき1回、失敗した回避を再判定できる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ve iyesi birbirine bitişikken her saldırıda bir kez başarısız {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} teşebbüsünde teste bir kez daha girerler.
